channel.title: [562/659] Project DungeonFest! Development Thread! [PDF] Updated MultiDaily!
channel.description:
Project DungeonFest! -August 7th
Ok to get into this development thread about Project DungeonFest it will be original: Before I jump into the features the base I am using is mezzyscape 562 loading 659 and after I am done it will not be a leech although the creator will still receive around 30% credits.
The features Project Dungeonfest will Have:
Project Dungfest will have an original Dungeoneering fully trainable skill which you will fight some pretty impressive Bosses and Monsters.
This project will be unlike any other project, such as dungeoneering shops!
That's right dungeoneering shops and will have warrior guild tokens as the money to buy stuff with :P which you can then use on the dungeoneering shop to spend on dungeoneering lamps for 200 a piece or to buy a chotic instead of floors like i had hoped, you will now receive random tokens from npc's dpending on the one you kill, lets just say you kill say for instance, you will kill graardor and get around 20 tokens maybe? then once you have 200 warrior guild tokens you will then be able to buy a lamp which will give you 100k xp when clicked! thats right 100k! a piece each dungeoneering lamp will give 100k xp!
As another note of starting up Project DungFest in the starter you will receive a single dungeoneering lamp click it and enjoy 15 free thousand experience! :)!
The dungeoneering shop will also consist of dungeoneering armour for 15m a piece! Consisting of every item as real runescape has in their dungeoneering shop! Also bathus will be added to your starter items and also as an added bonus when you complete a floor you will receive some new armour to use! Up until fractite then you will have to kill forgotten warriors to get higher armour, and bosses for others.
Also torva's bonuses are no longer 1-hit ko stats. They are near to exact like real runescape's real bonuses. During the final stage of dungeoneering the boss will drop torva based on a 10% drop rate! :)! If someone can help me code in working ge I will pay them with 18m rsgp! So keep that in mind! :)! I hope this project will be bigger than any other rsps ever released! Also I noticed the max cape has no emote or animation if anyone knows the animation and gfx for it please can you provide me with them so I can code it in thank-you! :)! Also citadels will be in Project DungFest also which will be the home location! :)! Pictures coming tomorrow and I will be updated daily with pics videos and more davidi2 if you happen to view this development topic then maybe you can help me with the ge I was hoping for I noticed davidscape v7 has it, and I will pay you with 18m rsgp if you can! :) Thank-You each and everyone of you MoparScape'ians for being such nice people I wouldn't be where I am right now without you guys!
-August 8th
Just woke up so I noticed when attacking a npc it is not x10 so within 2 minutes I fixed that :p kind of common sense tbh. Starting on Dungeoneering today wish me luck! [IMG]http://i1229.photobucket.com/albums/ee464/austin1234able/proof.png[/img] [font=courier][size=18pt]Starting floor Number One![/size][/font]
More coming soon thank you for your support! Little vid :P
http://s1229.photobucket.com/albums/ee464/austin1234able/?action=view&current=clip0027.mp4
-August 9th
Started working on dungeoneering itself and the lamp that now gives 5k xp :)! I hope you guys enjoy floor 1 starting today, thats right today! =D http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vAAQ3NurrAo [IMG]http://i1229.photobucket.com/albums/ee464/austin1234able/payingfornex.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1229.photobucket.com/albums/ee464/austin1234able/dungeoneeringplace.png[/img] I really wish i could do flooors etc. but it messe up the run button to where i can't even run the server so instead you will get tokens to spend on a shop at home!, so please enjoy it! :) so far it will be as so - Kill a rock crab get from 1-5 tokens, kill graardor get 25 tokens, kill kre' are get 25 tokens, all godwars bosses will give 25 tokens each, kill corp get 30 tokens, kill a td, get 10, kill any bosses gert around 10-30, and soon to come is the famous nex!, thats right nex!, kill him and get an insanely high 50 tokens per kill, kill him 4 times go and reward yourself with a lamp for 100k xp at the shop at home! :) Marcbob, help me code nex and that 17.6m rsgp is all yours ;)! ty for viewing guys! :) -August 10th I've added a dungeoneering tokens shop for 200 dungeoneering tokens a piece, basically warrior guild tokens lol! :D everything in the shop is 200 tokens a piece chaotics etc. i've also added korasi's sword's special attack, and fixed some bonuses, the lamps in the shop are red ofc. and when clicked they give 100k xp, goodluck getting 200 tokens ;) updating more later on! :P
-August 11th Added correct defender animations, that's right! :D! Added working ags special attack no glitchy attacks anymore! Dragon claws special attacks correct. Added token appearance upon killing an npc, removed from rock crabs because I didn't think it was fair to get them so easily. Korasi's special attack added, also it has the correct attack style, and doesn't look like your giving the npc a bj anymore rofl! New poll being released deciding if I should add a new whip special or not, your choice :p
-August 12th Added correct whip special old one looked gay rofl! (Hopefully Nex today!) If Nex is coded today I will be super happy! If Nex is coded he will have 2k hp and a max hit of 42 so gl ;)! Also I have made it to where if you achieve 99 dungeoneering you will receive the dungeoneering cape, (t) dungeoneering cape, and dungeoneering hood directly to your bank! Today I will be fixing the gay Dungeoneering emote you click skillcape thing and you vanish a sec then come back WTF? No cuz I'm gonna add the correct emote'(s)! Torva effect will be coded in! also coming today get ready to be amazed!!!!!! absorption coming today!!!!!!!!! =)!! If I didn't state this earlier ags special works! =)! Anyone know nex npc code? Pm me or comment below! We need nex c'mon!!!! Epic Abyssal Vine Whip Video!!!!!!!!!!!!! =) - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3IoTGST2JU8
-August 13th-15th Vacation ;) gonna be on here with my iPod, but can't code not bringing laptop :S Also an update - Original special attack never before used! I was told by 3 other people not to release it and to host it because if this gets leaked to the public it'll be just like torvapkz and be leeched so many times. I'm gonna let you the voters decide :p If the idea of the voters is no not to release, I will make up for it by making a webclient tutorial :p. Up to you guys if it's yes or no

item.title: [562/659] Project DungeonFest! Development Thread! [PDF] Updated MultiDaily!
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“coolguy12123, post:78, topic:408873”][quote author=judostar1 link=topic=510152.msg3775593#msg3775593 date=1318081463]

I need help. I am working on fixing some things in project dungeonfest 562 loading 659 made by austin cadle.

Austin said that the dragon claws are too powerful to npc’s and kill players in 1 special attack. How do you make it normal again?

(The stats for dragon claws are normal +51 slash bonus)

Please help.

And also, another urgent question, where is the grand exchange located in project dungeonfest. Just so you know, I checked in varrock and it wasnt there.

Please help me.

case 14484, in player vs player.java in the source. Try to fix that, and try 14486 too.
[/quote]

Thank you, but I have a server very similar to project dungeonfest that has it all fixed, also woth 666 mapdata, its called frostrealm and it was remoced yesterday because people were flaming a lot.

Btw, how do I add a grand exchange to it? I want people to buy and sell items using the g.e. Plz help me. Is there a tutorial on it? If so, where?[/quote]

frostrealm had a lot of flamming probably due to the anti leech.

Read full topic

item.title: [562/659] Project DungeonFest! Development Thread! [PDF] Updated MultiDaily!
item.dc:creator: @austin_cadle austin cadle
item.description:
@austin_cadle wrote:

[quote=“judostar1, post:58, topic:408873”][quote author=austin cadle link=topic=510152.msg3711100#msg3711100 date=1313356927]

You should work on a semi-realistic dungeoneering, the ring of kingship should bring u to deamonthium or deamonthiem (its a weird place idk how to spell it) and not to one of the rooms u complete in recruitment drive.

All in all, I love your releases, keep it up, but I think you should work on this one more and host it and not release it until you feel like it’s ready to be released.

No, I tried to code a dungeoneering floor and it messed up the server, that is why I said tokens will be dropped by npc’s and u can buy lamps from fire guy for 200 each, for 100k xp a piece

That’s a good alternative I gotta admit, but rather than releasing this, you should host it?

Good idea
When I get back tomorrow it’ll probly be online!
[/quote]

Sweet :D, pm me the dl link and Ill join in :D[/quote]

It’ll be a webclient, and also I’ll release a folder, with a jar in it, so people can’t leech my client

Read full topic
